<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Inner Fire](/Feats.aspx?ID=2554) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 102 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can call the fire inside you into the palm of your hand. You can cast the [_produce flame_](/Spells.aspx?ID=236) cantrip as an innate primal or arcane spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.
name: Inner Fire
